name: Unreal engine / Unity developer
description:
Please be advised! We will be glad to receive applications and give feedback to everyone after January 9.

We are an international IT outsourcing company. Since 2002, we have been working on major software development projects for world-famous Western European companies (automotive concerns, telecommunication companies, banks, medical corporations, etc.).

One of the company's strengths is its product development approach and the high level of integration of its developers into a distributed team, which allows them to directly influence the technical solution, code quality, and the project's result.

Where you can work: remotely from any country, having agreed standard working hours with the team.

How you can work: contract with an individual entrepreneur /self-employed person with payment in euros or employment contract with payment in the country's currency.

Project description: our European partner, one of the largest game studios, is now actively looking for developers to develop their game SDK and new game platforms.

We expect from candidates:

  • Unreal 5 / Unity Experience;
  • Experience in setting up a production pipeline;
  • D3D12 or Vulkan Experience;
  • Ability to get in and add functionality to existing source code;
  • Understanding of memory management, multi-threaded programming, and runtime optimizations;
  • Mastering C++, GLSL, HLSL;
  • Tools knowledges, 3DS Max, Maya; Motionbuilder;
  • CI/CD Tools experience;
  • Professional English;
  • Knowledge of character animation is a plus.

Responsibilities:

  • SDK and new platforms implementation: store SDK implementation, evaluation, and participation in porting production on different platforms;
  • CI/CD setup and implementation: technical support for internal studios, definition needs with IT departments. Monitoring and implementation of automation within ongoing productions;
  • Support Game Studios: you will share your experience with every studio and support development at important stages.

The benefits you get working with us:

  • A competitive salary with its increase as a result of a performance review on a regular basis.
  • Employment is based on an employment contract of the country or a private entrepreneur contract without any reference to a specific location.
  • Paid vacation and sick leave.
  • Working on exciting projects with a team of professionals.
  • Opportunities for learning and practicing new technologies; internal training.
  • Participating in inner meetups and permanent experience exchange with colleagues.
  • Well-defined development processes and methodologies.
  • English and/or French language learning for free with the teachers of NOVEO within working hours.
  • Reimbursement of medical fees, massage, or sports (internal analog of VHI).

About NOVEO:

  • On the market for 20 years.
  • Operational department in Eastern Europe.
  • Our clients are companies such as Decathlon, DIOR, Renault, BMW, Societe Generale.

Join the NOVEO developers team to solve challenging issues!
